ingredient.name: Fennel
ingredient.description: Carminative herb with digestive support and antimicrobial properties

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Supports beneficial bacteria growth and improves gut microbiome diversity
Antimicrobial properties fight harmful bacteria while supporting digestion

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Reduces gut inflammation and provides carminative properties for digestive support

symptom_effects.population_notes: Reduces bloating and gas with improved digestion and gut motility support

citations.title: Effect of fennel seed extract on STAT signaling
